name: Portofilio
desc: Repo of portofolio, you are watching right now

name: Vue dashboard
desc: This app simulates simple dashboard. You can add notes, reminds, expenses, tasks or expenses. I created it with VUE3 composition api, PINIA, VUETIFY and AXIOS at front. I used EXPRESS.JS, JOI.DEV, PRISMA.ORM and MYSQL for my API.

name: Fitapp
desc: This app allow u to note to monitor your daily nutritional value. I made it with NUXT2, VUETIFY and AXIOS at front and EXPRESS.JS to create API and connect it to MYSQL database

name: Frontend challanges
desc: Repo where I made some of frontend challanges. I made challanges in vanilla JS to improve skills. Every challange is in separate folder.

name: Smart Home Interface
desc: This app simulate, interface of smart home. Made with Vue.js(options api), Interact.js and a little bit of TypeScript

name: To do app v2
desc: So that was my first app, which I made in vue. This is version 2, rebuilded specially for my first server made with express.js. I also added a little bit of SCSS

name: Express backend
desc: My first backend made with express.js.

name: Calendar app
desc: Simple calendar app, where you can add tasks, to every day you want. I did this, without any date/calendar libraries, just Vue.js

name: NBA stats
desc: App for checking historical stats from nba games or single player stats. I made it with Vue.js (Vue router) and FREE API

name: Money Converter
desc: One of my first apps, made with Vue.js(options api) and free data currency api. This app allows you to convert currencies

name: TIC TAC TOE
desc: Everyone knows this game, I made it with vanilla JS.

name: TODO app
desc: My first app, which I made in Vue.js, this app use LocalStorage

name: TAI project
desc: This is a project for one of my study subjects. I made it with PHP, HTML and CSS

name: landing pages
desc: Also, you can find a repos with my landing pages, which I made, when I was learning HTML and CSS
